name: express-react-monorepo
description: An API and React app served by Express

scripts.build-production: NODE_ENV=production pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client && node dist/server/server.js
scripts.build-local: NODE_ENV=build pnpm run build:server && pnpm run build:client && node dist/server/server.js
scripts.test: nodemon --exec 'node src/server/app/app.js & find tests -name "*.test.js" | xargs node --experimental-vm-modules node_modules/mocha/bin/mocha --reporter min -r dotenv/config' || true
